The claim was shared on Facebook on Janu: 2021, along with a photo showing President Moon sitting in front of a teleprompter at a press conference.
The Korean: language text on the prompter in the original photo reads different questions asked by reporters, not the claim of the President reading a script.
Yonhap News Agency: a reputable news source, confirmed that the image had been manipulated and urged people to delete it if shared.
A spokesperson from the Presidential Blu: not a script for the President to read.
